activities: Servient processes and hosts data acting as as a "data processor" on behalf of corporate, government and individual clients and their legal counsel. We may provide any of the following services: data collection, data processing, data loading, data hosting. The data which is stored and processed by Servient may contain personal information of our clients' employees, partners or any other third party with which our clients may have data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Any individual may refer a privacy issue to Servient's CEO, Ian Wilson (ian@servient.com) for prompt resolution. If the issue cannot be resolved to that individual's satisfaction, Servient will agree to mediate the issue with the Houston Texas office of the American Arbitration Association (AAA). Any individual may file a request for mediation with the American Arbitration Association.
